disable: DC 20  Thievery  (expert) to scratch out the rune without allowing electricity to flow, or   dispel magic   (2nd rank;  counteract  DC 18) to counteract the rune
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Hazard 3" pfs="">[Electric Latch Rune](/Hazards.aspx?ID=468)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 101 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

An invisible rune imprinted on a door latch releases a powerful electric discharge.

---

**Stealth**
DC 20 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 20 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) (expert) to scratch out the rune without allowing electricity to flow, or [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1493) (2nd rank; [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=2250) DC 18) to counteract the rune

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Electrocution** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=534), [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586)) **Trigger** A creature grasps the door latch directly or with a tool; **Effect** The trap deals 3d12 electricity damage to the triggering creature (DC 22 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) Reflex save).
name: Electric Latch Rune
